name: Serverside Group
overview: Serverside Group, Ltd. provides software solutions to issuers, personalization bureaus, and manufacturers of the cards industry. It offers AllAboutMe, a Web-based card personalization application that allows its users to create own personal payment cards using the photos of loved ones, pets, favorite places, and memorable events; TalkAboutMe, an interactive banner advertisement tool that is used by issuers to showcase card design programs; and ShareMyDesign, an online marketing tool that allows cardholders to share and discuss card designs online. The company also provides Virtual Portfolio, a Web-based management tool that enables issuers to launch online card marketing campaigns, assess and adjust campaigns in real time, and print cards on demand; Image Checking, a web-based interface that is used to screen the images selected for personal card creation prior to printing; and Image Management, a browser-based application that allows issuers to coordinate and control image galleries. Serverside Group, Ltd. has strategic partnerships with Visa, Inc.; Datacard Corporation; PAYjr, Inc.; and CardParnter, Inc. The company was formerly known as Serverside Graphics Ltd. and in May 2005 it changed its name to Serverside Group Ltd. Serverside Group Ltd. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in London, United Kingdom with additional offices in New York, New York; Wauconda, Illinois; and Auckland, New Zealand.

funding_rounds.source_description: Gemalto invests in Serverside Group, the world leader in personalizing bank cards with digital images generated by end users
